Tonomy-ID-SDK - public API for integrationÔÉÅ

This Software Development Kit is used in Tonomy ID to interact and call with the EOSIO blockchain and services. It is also used as the public API for integration by applications to do single sign-on, share credentials and sign transactions.

The SDK is written in typescript with jest to run tests.

SDK library exists in /src

The following documentation will guide you through installing and running Tonomy-ID-SDK as well as providing an API reference documentation with examples.

Note

Tonomy-ID-SDK 1.x has been released. Checkout 1.x API documentation and migration guide for testing, early feedback and contributions.
